original_title: Two arrested over assault on railway employees in Bolawatte
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Two people have been arrested over the assault on a group of railway employees including the Station Master of the Bolawatte Railway Station in Wennappuwa.
They are scheduled to be produced for an identification parade on Sunday (14).
The Station Master of the Bowatte Railway Station and three other railway employees who sustained injuries in the assault are receiving treatment at the Negombo Hospital.
Police said the suspects were consuming alcohol on the platform of the railway station and the assault was the result of a dispute which followed when the railway employees asked them to leave.
Sri Lanka Railways said operations at the Bowatte Railway Station in Wennappuwa has been temporarily suspended.
Although trains stop at the railway station, no tickets are being issued.
Sri Lanka Railways added that attention has been directed towards deploying new staff at the railway station.
An investigation is also being carried out into the incident by the Railway Protection Force.
